game.name: DCS: Su-25 Flaming Cliffs
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Note: This is the exact same simulation of the Su-25 as featured in DCS: Flaming Cliffs 3.The Su-25 'Grach' (Rook), NATO callsigned 'Frogfoot', is a dedicated strike attack aircraft designed for the close air support and anti-tank roles. The Su-25 has seen combat in several conflicts during its more
